availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary Kidd. Father of Elizabeth Kidd, Laura Jane Kidd, Mary A. Kidd, Lurana Kidd, James Kidd, William Kidd, and Minerva A. Kidd. Farmer in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 2, p. 356. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, p. 22.
